verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%>, of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that were in <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>:

to whom the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H526>Amon<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, in the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign<s%>.

It came also in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, unto the <S%H8552>end<s%> of the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, unto the carrying <S%H1540>away<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1540>captive<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>.
Now the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Before <S%H2962><s%> I <S%H3335>formed<s%> thee in the <S%H990>belly<s%> I <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3318>thee<s%>, and before thou camest forth out of the <S%H7358>womb<s%> I <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H5414>thee<s%>; I have appointed thee a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> unto the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H162>I<s%>, Ah, <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>! <S%H3045>behold<s%>, I know not how to <S%H1696>speak<s%>; for I am a <S%H5288>child<s%>.

But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H559>me<s%>, Say <S%H5288>not<s%>, I am a child; for to whomsoever I shall <S%H7971>send<s%> thee thou shalt <S%H3212>go<s%>, and whatsoever I shall <S%H6680>command<s%> thee thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%>.
Be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> because of <S%H6440>them<s%>; for I am with thee to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H5002>thee<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Then <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H5060>touched<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5414>me<s%>, Behold, I have put my <S%H1697>words<s%> in thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>:

see <S%H7200><s%>, I have this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6485>set<s%> thee over the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and over the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%>, to pluck <S%H5428>up<s%> and to break <S%H5422>down<s%> and to <S%H6>destroy<s%> and to <S%H2040>overthrow<s%>, to <S%H1129>build<s%> and to <S%H5193>plant<s%>.

Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying, <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, what <S%H7200>seest<s%> <S%H559>thou<s%>? And I said, I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H4731>rod<s%> of an <S%H8247>almond-tree<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> unto <S%H3190>me<s%>, Thou hast well <S%H7200>seen<s%>: for I <S%H8245>watch<s%> over my <S%H1697>word<s%> to perform <S%H6213>it<s%>.

And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto me the second <S%H8145>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What <S%H7200>seest<s%> <S%H559>thou<s%>? And I said, I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H5301>boiling<s%> <S%H5518>caldron<s%>; and the <S%H6440>face<s%> thereof is <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%>.
Then <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6828>me<s%>, Out of the north <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall break <S%H6605>forth<s%> upon all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

For <S%H7121><s%>, lo, I will call all the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and they shall <S%H935>come<s%>, and they shall <S%H5414>set<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and against all the <S%H2346>walls<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and against all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

And I will <S%H1696>utter<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%> against them <S%H5921>touching<s%> all their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>, in that they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H6999>me<s%>, and have burned incense unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of their own <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

Thou therefore gird <S%H247>up<s%> thy <S%H4975>loins<s%>, and <S%H6965>arise<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto them all that I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H2865>thee<s%>: be not dismayed at <S%H6440>them<s%>, lest I <S%H2865>dismay<s%> thee before <S%H6440>them<s%>.

For <S%H589><s%>, behold, I have <S%H5414>made<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, and an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H5982>pillar<s%>, and <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H2346>walls<s%>, against the whole <S%H776>land<s%>, against the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, against the <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H3548>thereof<s%>, against the priests <S%H5971>thereof<s%>, and against the people of the <S%H776>land<s%>.
And they shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H3201>thee<s%>; but they shall not prevail against <S%H5002>thee<s%>: for I am with thee, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to deliver <S%H5337>thee<s%>.
